title: X's Colossus Supercomputer Changes the SC500 Performance Game
author: Agam Shah
description: X.AI has just finished installing Colossus, the largest AI supercomputer in the world. Hyperscalers Microsoft, Google, Facebook, Amazon, and Oracle are also spending billions.
cntitle: X的巨型计算机改变了SC500性能游戏
cndescription: X.AI刚刚安装完成Colossus，这是世界上最大的AI超级计算机。微软、谷歌、Facebook、亚马逊和Oracle等超大规模云服务提供商也正在投入数十亿美元。
